website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for dogs with chronic digestive issues, this probiotic can be taken daily to maintain gut health and combat a range of common problems caused by imbalances within the intestinal tract.
pros: Specially formulated for animals to promote optimal gut health
Aside from gently treating constipation, it also addresses a host of other problems, like diarrhea, loose stools, bad breath, allergies, and itching
Can be used as a follow-up to a more aggressive laxative to prevent future issues
cons: Might not work fast enough as a primary solution for severe cases of constipation

website_summaries.verdict: For giving precise dosage amounts to dogs, this powdered probiotic is great, but its results are somewhat mixed.
pros: Powdered supplement is easy to measure and mix into dog’s food
Many owners notice improvement of their dogs’ digestive issues within 1 week
cons: Doesn’t work for all dogs, and seems to exacerbate symptoms in others
Dosage amount sometimes needs to be tweaked for individual dog's needs

customer_reviews.title: Great product - but expiration date not checked prior to shipping
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and highly recommend it; however, this is the second bottle I've received with an expiration date just a few months away instead of one year. The product advertises it can be used up to 360 days - which is true for my pet - but not if the product expires way before that date. If the shippers would be aware of the expiration date prior to shipping and I received the product with a one-year expiration, I would give it a five. Be sure and check the expiration date when you receive a jar.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Jane

customer_reviews.title: Found a better product.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this probiotic for my dog's sensitive stomach, gas, diarrhea. Last time I ran out I tried NWC Total biotics. Works wonders, no more gas! Firm stools. And at a lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Tari Zimmaro

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I started to use this after I gave my dog the rest of the Purina Probiotics in the packets. I thought I would save some money and try this. BIG mistake. He had loose bowl movements, gas, upset stomach, and would not eat some mornings. I stopped it 3 weeks ago and he has been fine. I have thrown this in the trash and wasted $40. I guess the Purina in the packets was worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: This product is Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th purchase of Probiotics! I read a lot of reviews before choosing this one. It's amazing the changes in my pets. One of The dogs had a sensitive stomach, this cleared it up and stopped the gas. We took in an older cat that had stomach issues, smelled bad after a few weeks of this probiotic she stopped throwing up and stopped smelling bad. I changed her diet to a very healthy diet as well. I Will continue to add this supplement to my pets food for a happy, healthy home!
customer_reviews.author: wendy williams

customer_reviews.title: This product lives up to it claims.
customer_reviews.text: VERY pleased with this product. I have two Rat terriers (brothers). One (Dewey) has a voracious appetite but produced a lot of gas. The other (Duncan) was an extremely picky eater. It would take him 3 - 4 times longer to finish his meal and sometime he would not finish. We doctored his food with everything we could think of to make it more appetizing, but nothing seemed to work. When NUSENTIA Probiotic arrived I started adding one measure to their meals once a day. Within 2 - 3 days Dewey's gas was gone and Duncan regained his appetite. NUSENTIA Probiotics worked for us and we plan on keeping it as part of the meal plan.
customer_reviews.author: Roper Davis

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a different Probiotic but it was only helped some of what it promised. I tried this and it helped nothing. The yeast, allergies, and breath issues all flared back up. It did help me to realize how well the past one had been helping. I'm going to try a third one with hopes that it comes through with at least most of what it promises. Fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Seems excellent to me; two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Purchased December 2018. I researched the microbio types in here and think the manufacturer did an EXCELLENT job picking their ingredients! Do Not Change Your MicroBio Mix, Please!!! Zero chinese input = yet another kudos! Both dogs eat without complaint and have healthy stools. I have tasted it; seems easily palatable to me. This alone for one dog and all is well. This and a little pumpkin for the second dog (note: dog 2 chews a lot of rawhide and the pumpkin helps counter the rawhide.) For reference, main feed for these dogs is mix of nutro ultra large-breed puppy, nutro ultra large-breed adult and merrick beef+sweet potato.
customer_reviews.author: daveB

customer_reviews.title: Be careful! May be better purchasing directly with Nusentia.
customer_reviews.text: I wonder about the freshness of this product through Amazon. I usually purchase directly through Nusentia but purchased one time through Amazon. All of my other purchases, the product granules were pure white. With this product, the granules were light yellow. At first I thought there was a change in formulation. But when my next purchase though Nusentia was once again pure white granules, it made me wonder if I received a second rate product through the amazon seller.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P.

customer_reviews.title: No Scoop???
customer_reviews.text: So I have not tried this on my dogs yet, it just got here but it was slightly disappointing that the instructions are in MG and says "one scoop" for small or "two scoops" for large dogs but it did not include an actual scoop. I had to pull up a mg to tsp converter to find that the 2 scoop serving they state to use is actually .14 teaspoons....because everyone has a .14 teaspoon scoop just laying around their house....hopefully this stuff works because they aren't starting out on a good foot with me that's for sure!
customer_reviews.author: That Opinionated Chick

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Results
customer_reviews.text: I did hours of research and found this was the best value/results. We have been using it for 6 months (one scoop at breakfast only unless doggo has been in a stressful situation or counter surfed lol). Has helped improve our dog's health and BMs. We switch food constantly (for various reasons but mainly picky doodle) and this has helped us have ZERO digestive issues and create an "iron stomach". Super happy. 10/10!! *taped little serving spoon to a string and then to the side of the container for ease of dosage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miraculous
customer_reviews.text: My tea cup Yorkie was suffering from terrible yeast infections​. Her skin was terrible, scaly and discolored. She had sores from scratching. She had malassezia; which is caused by an overgrowth of yeast in the digestive system. This product is truly a Miracle! Her skin has significantly improved in just four weeks. The discoloration is gone. The odor is gone. She isn't scratching anymore. I have spent close to $2000 on vet bills prior to purchasing Probiotic Miracle!! Glad I found this for her... she was really suffering before.
customer_reviews.author: Keith M. English

customer_reviews.title: Well, we tried it....
customer_reviews.text: We tried this product after years of using Purina Forti-Flora because the price had jumped up so high. Within a few days, he began to show signs of it disagreeing with his system. Therefore, we halted using the new produce and went back to the product that is wildly priced but at least it agreed with his gut.
customer_reviews.author: dgi

customer_reviews.title: caused stomach issues
customer_reviews.text: We had been using a Probiotic but it was not available so we tried your product & bought 2 to get a better price per jar. We used it on our 75 LB black Mouth Cur which caused stomach issues. He started eating a lot of grass to throw up and very loose stools. After taking him off NUSENTIA Probiotic Miracle Dog Probiotics for Dogs he improved to normal stools and does not throw up or eat grass like he did taking this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working well
customer_reviews.text: We switched to this after the brand we had been using for years was no longer available and the one we substituted didn't seem to be working as well. It is a little more expensive, but since the recommended portion is smaller, it actually last longer than the other brand we tried. Our 3 senior dogs all seem to be doing well on this -- one previously had problems with very hard and infrequent stools and the other two regularly had loose stools. All 3 are now pretty regular with "normal" stools.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Boots

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement
customer_reviews.text: Switched to this from the Purina Fortiflora. Honestly, this is definitely a cheaper alternative considering I feed it to my pup every day. It does make him a bit gassy... He's been burping a lot more than usual but that's honestly a small price to pay to get rid of his diarrhea. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: No more eye goop!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been on these probiotics along with the enzymes for a little over a year. During that time his hot spots and eye goop disappeared (he came to me as a rescue with some allergies). I started to run out recently and thought I’d try to taper him off it to see how it went, but the eye goop started coming back. I got a new order in and re-started him on it and the eye goop disappeared practically overnight! I’ll make sure he always gets his Nusentia probiotics going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for my dog!
customer_reviews.text: I had read that probiotics were good for dogs just as they are for humans. My male dog has always had times where he would suffer from gastritis so I decided that if Probiotics helped myself then it would be good for the dogs as well. It's made a big change in him and he has not had gastritis since starting this product a month ago. I give it to both dogs every morning. It's easy to sprinkle the small scoop on their food and they love it as it does have a pleasant taste to it. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Cures a sensitive stomach.
customer_reviews.text: My 11 lb. dog's stomach used to make terrible noises, especially in the mornings. It sounded like a clogged pipe trying to drain. I knew she didn't feel well because she didn't want to eat her breakfast (expensive raw frozen dog food, thawed out). I started using this product 2-3 months ago and pretty quick there were no more weird stomach noises coming from her and she was eating heartily. I highly recommend trying this product if your dog has similar stomach issues. Thanks for listening.
customer_reviews.author: greenpeepers

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work but don't give too much upset stomach
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to work for dogs and cats. Using it for one dog and one cat. The dog did get upset stomach a couple times with this so reduced the amount given. The cat had a little bit upset stomach (growling stomach and vomited) also so made sure to only give little bit every day. It seems to be working to help make them regular. They say give one scoop every day but I would only give maybe a quarter of a scoop so they don't have upset stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Cool

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how to recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was one of the top probiotics for dogs. However, I have had to stop using it because it caused my dogs to become extremely itchy. They had not been this way beforehand and when I stopped using it after noticing how itchy they were the symptoms stopped. Not sure what the deal was and I can’t say whether I would recommend this or not. Like all things just a trial and error kind of thing. I just hate I had to spend a lot of money because now I have half a jar left.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Pirtle

customer_reviews.title: Great product for my German Shepard/Akita mix
customer_reviews.text: Juno, our German Shepard/Akita mix has a very sensitive digestive system. I have been searching for a product like this (powder form and she doesn't know it is mixed in her food) for a long time and this works great for her. It is very economical unlike the pills in the market and we are very happy with it. this is my second batch for her and I will continue to buy it. She has firm stools and I don't hear her tummy growling often as she used to. I have bought this for the 3rd time and just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps Tiny Tummy Trouble
customer_reviews.text: I have a Yorkie and they have very sensitive tummies. I sprinkle this on her food and she doesn't seem to mind. I do not notice any smell to this. It is a very fine powder. I have noticed she does not have as many upset, nervous tummy moments. She seems to have a better appetite. I just purchased my second order and I do recommend this. I will be purchasing more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Use with 4 dogs of various breeds, ages, and sizes and they all like it!
customer_reviews.text: This powder only requires a small scoop provided in the package regardless of the weight of the dog. It is a fine what powder with no smell. The dogs don't mind it at all. I don't know how you can really tell if it does what it should for the dog or not from a health perspective as I use this as a preventative - none of my dogs have issues from using it. They range in age from 2 yrs to 12 yrs.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie F

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Value and So Beneficial
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that a little goes a very, very long way. I have two senior boys - Kaos is 9 and is an Mastiff/Boxer mix that weighs in at 116 lbs. Toby is our new boy, been with us just 6 days. He's also 9 years old, an American Bulldog, and weighs in at 108. He has allergies and I originally bought this for him but I know it will be beneficial for both my boys. Even using for both boys this container will last me about 45 days. I'm grateful for that as feeding the two takes a chunk out of the budget. They are getting what they need and I'm not going broke.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine L. Bonnell

customer_reviews.title: Reduced Stomach Issues in my Dog
customer_reviews.text: I have a pitbull with a very sensitive stomach and food allergies. I put him on this in hopes that it would improve his issues. He used to throw up any time he drank too much water. He would also randomly throw up regularly. These issues have resolved within about a week of starting to give my dog this probiotic. He still struggles with skin allergies but we're so happy to have his stomach issues cleared up. Also, per the directions, we started out giving him a double or triple dose twice a day which seemed to help faster.
customer_reviews.author: C. Eagan

customer_reviews.title: Great Probiotic
customer_reviews.text: My American Bulldog puppy has IBD/IBS and we tried other probiotics on Amazon, but it didn't seem to help at all. I switched him to this one, and I noticed that his coat is softer and his skin is doing better. He's on a long course of Metronidazole and a Royal Canin gastrointestinal/fiber diet, but I recently ran out of his antibiotic for a weekend, and instead of reverting back to his diarrhea like with other probiotic, he was fine. Given his coat and skin quality, I'm going to say that this product is definitely helping his treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Recommended Probiotic for Pet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as it was recommended by a holistic pet site on FB. I find that this probiotic helps my pet. I notice that you do not have to give a lot (compared to other product probiotic amounts). This helps with a dog who is very sensitive to what you put into his or her food. I recommend this product as most pets need probiotics in their food.
customer_reviews.author: santoval3

customer_reviews.title: Economical choice as post antibiotic therapy  for C. Diff toxin A&B infection in 11 year old dog
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old Border Collie suffered a C. Difficile (Toxin A and B) infection. She was sick for months, and lost a lot of weight. Finally she got a diagnosis and proper antibiotic therapy. I wanted to minimize the risk of reinfection, so researched aggressive probiotic therapy on my own. I chose Nusentia Probiotic Miracle because it is one of the few that contains Lactobacillus reuteri, which has been shown to be effective against C. Diff. It has been 1 month since she began taking this and everything is back to normal (no more diarrhea or vomiting) and she is gaining weight again.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat had diarrhea from the first day I adopted him. He was on the vet's recommended probiotic with no results. I started probiotic miracle when our cat was 6 months old and he has not had diarrhea since. He is 2 years old now. I pair it with the enzyme miracle. He is doing great! I also have a dog that had yeast infections in his ears and his paws. His coat was rough and dry. I changed foods over the years...tried omega oil...nothing worked. I started him on probiotic miracle and no more ear infections, his paws are back to normal and his coat is beautiful. Within a week of giving him this probiotic, he was 90% better.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary J. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: May be a good product but didn't work for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after reading information that it may help with yeast outbreak for my dogs skin. The suggestion was that starting with a healthy gut is first step. I have had 4 large dogs on it for a month and see no changes that I wasn't previously seeing with frequent antifungal shampoos. It may be good for the gut but too expensive to continue using without seeing improvement.
customer_reviews.author: just me

customer_reviews.title: Intestinal Problem Gone!
customer_reviews.text: After reading several reviews and talking to a fellow dog owner who has used probiotics for her senior dog I decided to give this a try. Our small dog has had a problem with diarrhea for a few weeks. It has now cleared up and has continued to be! Our dog eats it mixed with a small amount of dog food and loves it! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: HER2fight

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product...
customer_reviews.text: I received this product 6 days ago and I can tell you that it is working. One of my dogs has the habit of eating grass every morning and that really makes me uncomfortable because the grass is full of chemicals that are very dangerous. Well, after the second day of eating food with this product Lil Jett completely stopped eating grass! That means her digestive track became balanced and she has no need to eat grass. I am very happy with the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Good, but powder changed from white to pink??
customer_reviews.text: Been ordering this a long time, and it's always been white...the one I got is now pink. Contacted seller about this, as a dog of mine was DX'ed with IMHA, though I doubt this product has anything to do with it, the color change came to mind when I was asked what my dog ate. I just saw another post from someone who also got it in pink....if they changed color, they need to let us know.
customer_reviews.author: The Senator

customer_reviews.title: Really helped tighten up my German Shepherd's poop
customer_reviews.text: Yes, strange headline, BUT (or BUTT lol), my senior German Shepherd has had loose stool for a while and had gotten worse as the years went on. I went to the vet and they suggested both a grain free diet and a pro-biotic. We changed her food to Taste of the Wild and also added in Probiotic Miracle. And it worked! Her stools through out the day are solid and easy to clean up. Plus she isn't pooping as much either. I chose this particular probiotic because of the reviews and the price. Plus, you only need a small spoonful to add to the food.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Hedges

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I can't say much about the flavor as it is for my dog's. I noticed no sent from this product. I did notice my dogs started eating better at feeding times and stopped eating things such as grass. Their coats also seemed better and thicker as they also stopped shedding as much. I do intend to buy this product again along with some vitamin supplements and I think this should do the trick. The great thing is about this product is you add it to the food they are already eating and that's it.
customer_reviews.author: steve Lott

customer_reviews.title: great stuff
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is great my lab and Rottweiler both shed and itched but after a few week of miracle dog no more my wife works for a vet as a dog groomer for over 20 yrs and and she cant believe how good miracle dog is this works just as good or if not better then what you get at your vet
customer_reviews.author: vance matters

customer_reviews.title: GSD Didnt Do Well On This
customer_reviews.text: Have used this with both dogs for almost 2 months now. Will not be repurchasing it and will try another brand. We tried this as a previous brand we used switched their product & our dogs didn't do as well on it. With Probiotic Miracle our GSD is actually having more bowel movements. Although they are "normal" it appears he's constipated with this product. He spends quite a bit of time now trying to do his business. He's 4 and has never had this issue before. Hopefully another brand will work for him.
customer_reviews.author: MissBetsyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: OUTDATED JAR
customer_reviews.text: This was Ordered Aug 16 2019 but I did not use it immediately as I had not finished our pre and pro biotics at that point but when I went to use it this week I noticed the expiration was dated April 31,2020 which does not make sense since there are 360 scoops which should last one year minus 5 days. This jar would not. It would have only been good for 6 months. They would not take responsibility and Nusentia would do nothing to make it right
customer_reviews.author: harrysally

customer_reviews.title: Very beneficial!
customer_reviews.text: I really did like the changes I saw in all 10 of my dogs! They didn't mind the taste or texture of the powder. It was extremely easy to give them, 1 level scoop both meals. And it makes me feel better knowing that they'll have a healthy gut to better process their kibble, get more of the nutrients out of the kibble, and that it will help deter the worms that they're exposed to, since the worms don't stick around a healthy gut.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M Taylor

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: After 1.5 months adding this to dogs food I can honestly say has helped both my dogs but in different ways. Zeke used to always eat grasses, seemed like nonstop, now we can be out in a field playing and he rarely stops to eat grass--trust me this is an amazing change. Maggie had very soft and foul smelling stools even though fed same high quality food as Zeke, since been adding this her stools have firmed up and although not smelling like flowers they are much less vile. Will absolutely continue to use this.
customer_reviews.author: darcan

customer_reviews.title: A must for dogs with allergies
customer_reviews.text: My dog was constantly having problems with either ear infections, or anal gland infections, or both. It seemed like I was bringing her to the vet every month for one thing or the other. I was recommended by a friend to try giving her some probiotics. She has been problem-free for a few months now. Her ears are heathy and stink-free and we aren't woken up in the middle of the night by her scratching, licking and head shaking anymore. An added bonus - no more dog breath! This has been great for us, I'm so glad we tried it.
customer_reviews.author: WeezyG

customer_reviews.title: This has worked GREAT for my cat
customer_reviews.text: This has worked GREAT for my cat. He used to throw up all the time. Then I bought this for my two dogs & gave him some too. He can only handle 1/2 of an 1/8 tsp. any more than that, twice/day he would throw up. (My MinPin & Chihuahau get 1 level 1/8 tsp).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally a little relief
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It does take a little bit to work, but 3 weeks in and the itchies are finally starting to calm down. Pulling my hair out with my pups allergies. Allergy shots, shampoos, sprays (yes from the vet) and changing food multiple times.... Finally a little relief.
customer_reviews.author: coffee24973

customer_reviews.title: It is a miracle.
customer_reviews.text: My nine year old rescue dog has been on this product for one and a half years. He was getting almost weekly bouts of diarrhea that frequently required a veterinary intervention and medication. Not only that, he could clear a room with his gas! I can honestly say that within a week I noticed a difference. He did however take about six weeks for the full benefits of the product to kick in. So do not give up! If you are having digestive issues with your dog, I fully and highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: jojo's talkin

customer_reviews.title: Product may become hard and unusable
customer_reviews.text: I have really liked this product and felt that it was helping my dog. But unfortunately both jars that I purchased became hard the last third of the jar and became unusable. This makes it quite expensive when you can't use the last third of the product. I kept the jar in a dark place with the lid on and it never came into contact with moisture. I contacted the company and while they were very friendly, were not helpful. They told me to just contact Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MaryKaye

customer_reviews.title: Made My Dog Worse!
customer_reviews.text: I have one dog that has an upset stomach quite often. I had read that probiotics could be helpful so I purchased this product. The longer I gave my dog the probiotic, on his food, twice a day, as directed on the container, the worse and more frequent his upset stomach got. I finally decided to stop the probiotic and his upset stomach got better. He will always have stomach issues to some extent, but one every 3 weeks is better than every other day, literally!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth G

customer_reviews.title: Extremely helpful, great value
customer_reviews.text: This has definitely made a difference with our dog, whose gut was messed up by worms snd two rounds of deworming. The price tag may seem high but it” s really a great value. At the rate we”re going I think it”s going to last well over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lewandowski

customer_reviews.title: More Effective Than Purina Fortiflora At A Significantly Lower Cost.
customer_reviews.text: We have three Aussies which have had intestinal problems since having an intestinal infection three years ago. Fortiflora was only marginally effective at a cost of $100/month. After switching to Nusentia we have found that our dogs have far fewer episodes of intestinal problems. We told our Vet about Nusentia. After researching it she said she is going to start recommending it her clients as an alternative to Fortiflora.
customer_reviews.author: William Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I waited until I finished the product before writing a review. I have 4 dogs who are fed the best diet possible and have always been on a probiotic. An unexpected, but AMAZING side effect is that it cleared my French Bulldogs tear stains. No matter what I tried in all 4 years of his life, nothing helped. Adding this to his food every morning is the only change he experienced in diet over the last few months and his eyes no longer water AT ALL! His face is so much cleaner. This will now be my go to probiotic product!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Good improvement
customer_reviews.text: I have a bull terrier with a horrible digestive system and chronic allergies. He is allergic to almost everything and it seems like he’s never pooped a solid poop for his entire life. I had him on another probiotic that did help him a lot with his allergies, shedding and his poops kinda. But he still had runny poop so I figured why not try another brand. Well he’s been on this new one for about 3 weeks and he has not had a runny poop yet. It does seem to help his allergies more than the other one too.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: A big win for dog owners
customer_reviews.text: I am a repeat purchaser of this great product. I have 3 dogs and one has chronic yeast ear problems. Since being on Probiotic Miracle, her yeast has been significantly reduced which means less discomfort for her and less trouble for me! All three dogs benefit from taking this. They have less stomach upset and better nutrient absorbsion which can be seen in their shiny coats. Thank you for making such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Allison M.

customer_reviews.title: This product worked for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: We rescued our Australian Shepherd when she was about 5 months old. She was underweight due to the extreme case of worms that she had when the rescue found her. We took her about a month later. Our vet recommended putting her on a probiotic to calm down her system after being de-wormed so many times. We started using a scoop of this everyday. She began to put weight on and we could see her health in her beautiful coat. She is now over a year and very healthy. She now gets a rounded scoop everyday. The picture shows her as healthy and energetic as can be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product because my Corso puppy was on anti biotics for a UTI. His ears stunk and his breath. So I did some research and found that probiotics could help balance the smell and it worked! After a couple weeks the smell gradually went from nasty to tolerable/ regular/ and then better then normal smell. His ears have cleared up 90%. Instead of cleaning them every day I only Have to spot clean once a week or longer. Very happy with my decision to try probiotics in his daily meals.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Allen

customer_reviews.title: My New Must Have
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has been God sent! My Rotty used to have horrible gas and stomach always making rumbling noise. Since taking this there is no more gas or noise. I give it to my Shepherd/Dane mix as well just to ensure good gut health. Because it requires so little this bottle is going to last a while even with feeding both. Great value and works as stated. My picky eating Rotty has no problem with it being mixed with her food.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: Frito feet and itchiness resolved!
customer_reviews.text: My 4-year-old dachshund had some yeast issues this summer- frito feet, smelly itchy ears, and low energy. I started to sprinkle this on her food every morning and she's all better! She's not gnawing on her paws and she smells SO much better. She has more energy to play with her sister who also gets Probiotic Miracle and her ears are much less itchy too. No digestive issues upon starting the probiotic. Yeast issues were resolved quickly and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LauraJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for 6 years and swear by it. When we got our Australian Shepherd from the rescue she had the runs really bad. Vet did tests and couldn't find anything. She suggested probiotics and things have been great ever since. She is 9 now and so far very healthy with a beautiful coat. She was 2 when we got her and her coat has grown long and luxurious since then. Don't know if the probiotics has had anything to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Helps My Dog's Digestion
customer_reviews.text: My dog had to go on a diet food for kidney stones and it made his feces very soft. I was adding pumpkin into his food and it helped but it was just messy. My vet recommended a probiotic. I found this one and one small scoop fixed everything. And it will last a half year. 1 scoop twice a day with food for a small dog. I do refrigerate this because probiotics can lost potency over time. I don't know that it's recommended by the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Michaelene Waldron

customer_reviews.title: This product has absolutely worked for my two 7 month old puppies.
customer_reviews.text: My puppies had soft stools almost daily and diarrhea the instant they ate something they shouldn’t - like leaves, wood mulch, or tree bark! After including this probiotic into their diet it’s been back to healthy stools within about a week. They will still get an occasional soft stool every now and then but it’s no longer a daily problem and there's been no diarrhea at all in the 1 month since I’ve been using this product. I love that it is all natural and contains no "bad stuff”. I’m convinced it is a quality product and I plan to continue using it with my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Anil S

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my dog's digestive issue
customer_reviews.text: My Doberman Pinscher suffered from chronic diarrhea for years. I switched to a high-quality food that helped, but didn’t completely resolve his issue. After a couple of weeks adding NUSENTIA Probiotic Miracle Dog Probiotics powder to his food twice a day, he had perfect poop! I’m on the second container and still very satisfied with the results. I’ve also noticed his skin and coat are in great shape. It may be a coincidence, but he doesn’t have “goopy” eyes since I’ve added the probiotic powder to his food either. I plan to continue using this product daily for the rest of his life to keep his system in balance.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: We initially ordered this for one of our pups. Our vet had suggested putting her on a probiotic to help combat the vaginitis she has as a result of being spayed too young. It helped tremendously with that. She loved it so much that if we forgot to put it on her food, she would tell us. This is our 2nd order and we’ve now put all of our dogs on it. It definitely makes a difference in their overall well being. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Torquato

customer_reviews.title: Digestive System Working Great!
customer_reviews.text: This product does keep my dog’s digestive system working great. However, other products I have used in the past had a more “grainy” texture which makes it easier for scooping & sprinkling over his food. This “talcum” powder consistency is harder to accurately scoop & will not come off the scooper without tapping it on the side of the bowl which means all the powder is in one exact area.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieJ

customer_reviews.title: It worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Hi, Our 2 Bichons were having recurring infections following rounds of anti-biotics. The antibiotics would clear up the infection (we used Clamavox), then 2 – 3 weeks later the infection returned. After the last round of antibiotics, we started the girls on NUSENTIA Probiotic Miracle Dog Probiotics for Dogs. Not only did the infection not return but their stools are now healthier than ever! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: John in Port Ludlow

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Remarkable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our oldest, Duke, who is an 18 year old Minpin Chihuahua, was having a rough time keeping up with our younger dogs. Two of our youngest were always trying to get him to play but he would just lay there or growl at them. Within two weeks of takin Nusentia, what a difference. Duke was running around prancing and playing with the other dogs. Even joining in on the barking. He is like his old self. We get such enjoyment watching Duke enjoying life again.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen H.

customer_reviews.title: She is now absolutely fine. No issues any more
customer_reviews.text: Took time to work, which was expected. Had to adjust the dose to heaping 1/8 teaspoon for 10 pound Pom. It was worth the wait and the tweaking. She is now absolutely fine. No issues any more. She had chronic issues for years, that the veterinarians could not fix. This product, as far as we are concerned, did what it is supposed to do perfectly. Will be keeping her on it for the rest of her life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Having been very pleased with how it helped my dogs digestive problems
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd order of Probiotic Miracle. Having been very pleased with how it helped my dogs digestive problems, I reordered it. When I opened it, there was a distinct change in the color. THe first jar was pure white and looked like powdered sugar. This jar had a distinct yellow hew to it — kind of like corn meal. Now I’m afraid to use it. I ordered it well in advance of my 1st jar being empty and have had it for about one month. Will they let me return it? Need to call manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria L. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Gut / Better Breath
customer_reviews.text: This product keeps the stomach health of my 3 dogs in great shape. I can tell by their breath which has improved 90%. I've been using this product on a daily basis for about 8 months. I realized just how great this product was working when it ran out and I took about 2 weeks to reorder. Once I resumed giving them this product, It took less than 3 days to get them back on track.
customer_reviews.author: dmr2000

customer_reviews.title: 365 servings: Best deal anywhere and great product!
customer_reviews.text: This costs maybe one fifteenth of the price of other probiotic products for pets on the market, which are outrageously expensive. ONE tub of this has enough servings of the powder for an entire year if your pet is less than 80 lbs. Better yet, my mastiff Zeus has stopped eating grass, stopped eating dirt, and his stool is back to normal and no longer runny. Super happy I got this, we will he customers for life.
customer_reviews.author: mp17403824

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 jars of this, it came highly recommended by a friend who fed it to her dog with cancer. I don't know how much good it did my dog in the short time I fed it, within about 3 months the whole container was solidified, I couldn't even scrape off enough to fill the tiny scoop. I have other products stored in the same cabinet and none of them have done this. It was a total waste of money for me when I had to throw away the better half of two jars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Soon to Tell
customer_reviews.text: I started using this probiotic for my Airedale about 1 month ago at the recommendation of my holistic vet. It is part of a process to determine the source of his skin/allergy issues. It does seem that his poop is not as soft. I've also changed his food to a limited ingredient diet. (I gave the product 3 stars for flavor and 3 stars for scent because I have no idea of either. It's a powder and I can't smell it. I mix it with my 'dale's food, and he doesn't refuse it, so I guess the flavor is fine.) We'll see in a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Cash

customer_reviews.title: Great for loose or soft stool in Great Danes! Try it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for loose or soft stools. I have used this with two of my Great Danes, both with touchy intestines. Higher doses given at first sign of a problem, then a smaller maintenance dose daily. Because this works for me, I have not looked into other such products.Also I have purchased from the company itself, not always on Amazon. Prices are similar and no shipping. The company is hard to get in touch with. Might look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: CAK

customer_reviews.title: Recent order caused major diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: Our breeder recommended this product at and our dogs all LOVE the sprinkle on their food. UPDATE This recent order gave all 3 dogs runny poops! I had to take them to the vet to be tested for possible other causes but the vet said that since this was the only new item added to their diet or normal routine it was probably the culprit and to stop using it immediately. The vet then told us we should get Fortiflora by Putin’s which we did and everything cleared up within three days so we’re back to normal and will not order this ever again
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Great product - helps my "sensitive stomach" dog feel better.
customer_reviews.text: I own a dog who has a sensitive stomach and is prone to stomach issues -- especially when he eats rocks!! I switched to this probiotic from another I had been using for some years that went out of business. I chose this one because of all the positive reviews, and I haven't been disappointed. This is my second order and I think he has done much better - less stomach issues - since he has been on Probiotic Miracle. It certainly doesn't keep him from stomach problems when he eats something he shouldn't, but it really helps him get back on track and feel better much sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Brinks

customer_reviews.title: We sprinkle it on their food once a day and they are good to go
customer_reviews.text: Helps cut down on the yeast problems my dogs had, ear and skin infections. We have way less vet bills and my dogs aren't on antibiotics continuously any more. We sprinkle it on their food once a day and they are good to go. Truly a "miracle". It is totally worth a try if your dog has a lot of infections or smelly ears. This wasn't available once so we tried another one. Not as good as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Schnitt

customer_reviews.title: Happy healthy old girl
customer_reviews.text: My girl (11yr old pit mix) had pancreatitis about a month ago so the vet recommended several changes to her diet plus adding a probiotic. We are about half way through our first container and she is doing great. Eats up her food quickly, no accidents in the house, seems back to normal. We will definitely keep this as part of our new feeding routine.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Austen

customer_reviews.title: Ordered August 20, 2019 expires in May 2020
customer_reviews.text: My dog had tummy problems and got an antibiotic from the Vet. When I finished that I ordered the NUSENTIA Probiotic. As far as I can tell it is fine. I put it on my dog's food and she likes it. My big disappointment is that it will expire in less than a year. That's not OK. I have a small dog and she will not be finished using it all in that time. It may well deserve five stars if it wasn't going to expire in less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Mamie

customer_reviews.title: Works well for our 10-year old German Shepherd
customer_reviews.text: We have a 10-year old German Shepherd with recurring problems in his digestive system. Through trial and error, we have found that NUSENTIA Probiotic Miracle Dog Probiotics used as a daily dietary supplement helps to keep him defecating satisfactorily. I am not rating 5 stars only because I consider the product to be overly expensive.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Does not do anything at all in over a month
customer_reviews.text: Just about everything. It has not helped with anything that is advertised on your site. We have given it to our Cocker spaniel and our Shitzu as directed on the container and even have given them some extra for a week and still nothing. I feel that your product was a waste of our money and would not recommend it to anyone. Sorry I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Probiotic!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my border collie after trying 2 other brands that were not doing the trick. After the 1st use her stomach was already back to regular and stool was more firm! After a few days she has more energy and less emergency bathroom trips. This is a much more affordable option (my vet pointed me to Amazon to keep costs down). In over 30 days of using this product, now all 3 of my dogs are using this daily and they've never been happier.
customer_reviews.author: Aleshia C Eckard

customer_reviews.title: I has worked well for me
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for a month. The main thing I’ve noticed is that my 2 Bulldogs poops are now FINALLY a normal consistency. I feed them pricey food from this website, but 1 Bullie was having poop that was a little soft, Bullie #2 had constipation where I had to give her suppositories. Now they have normal poops. (I had tried the expensive anti diarrheal powder made by Purina, it did nothing)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Well it's working
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect it to cure my elderly dog's sudden onset PICA but has helped her chronic stomach issues tht she has had since young that have worsened in old age because she just can't hold it that good anymore. Things are stabilized. I won't say she looks shiny or her eyes brighter or anything like that but she is more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kid

customer_reviews.title: He is dooing much better. Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Bently doesn t even know it is in his food. I have tried others and he wouldn't eat his food so this is a great product. It is helping his colitis.
customer_reviews.author: Linda N Durgin

customer_reviews.title: The dogs like it! the stomach is doing well
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak for the doggies (i have 2). But since i started adding it to the meals for them - no stomach issues. They go regularly and well (no diarrhea) They eat it no problem sprinkled over the food. No flavor or smell. Just a white powder. The contained is fairly big and it will last for a while. So far we are happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: my dog did not like it.
customer_reviews.text: I am sure this product is okay but I made a mistake. I should have accessed my dogs needs completely before purchasing. My dog was sick after ingesting this product. It may have been too much for him and he is probably stomach sensitive. He was vomiting and had diahhrea for 2 days. I discontinued use. So, my dog did not like it.
customer_reviews.author: LucyD

customer_reviews.title: Say goodbye to 'doggy smells'
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased to have found this product. I makes all the difference to my pets. There is a faint berry smell, but my dogs sure don't mind. I give them their dose in the morning with a little bit of wet food and they scarf it down. Since they have been using Probiotic Miracle, there is a vast reduction in 'doggy breath', general doggy smell and they are both feeling better and more energetic. (our little girl has had frequent tummy upsets in the past and the incidence of upsets is greatly reduced, as well as having much easier bowel movements) This package with last us quite a while and is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: SUZANNE

customer_reviews.title: I started up again when he was started on antibiotics for infection of his incision and his stools look great now. So my advice for others is to ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really hopeful this would help my dog’s diarrhea. It took awhile, but his stool is back to normal. He had been on flagyl for 3 weeks for giardia, and despite a negative follow up stool test he was still having loose stools. I used 3 scoops of this probiotic 2x/day for 2 weeks, stoped for one week due to needing surgery for swallowing a toy. I started up again when he was started on antibiotics for infection of his incision and his stools look great now. So my advice for others is to not give up on this product too soon. It sounds like it may take longer to work for some dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie H

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be even superior to Fortiflora with a higher number of strains of ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a German shepherd with EPI (a non-functioning pancreas). One of the requirements for managing her condition is adding a probiotic to every meal. We had used Purina's Fortiflora until they pulled a Big Pharma and raised its price by almost 50%. So I began looking around and found this product. We've now used it for about 3 weeks and are elated. Our dog is too! It seems to be even superior to Fortiflora with a higher number of strains of micro-organisms than Fortiflora has. We highly recommend this product based upon our experience with it so far. TC 1/25/17
customer_reviews.author: Storma

customer_reviews.title: This improved my dogs skin
customer_reviews.text: My dog (Hobo) suffered from skin issues. The Vet said it was a yeast infection on her skin. She was getting shots and pills every month just to keep her from chewing huge holes in her fur. I started her on this probiotic and she is doing much better. She only has shots 2 or 3 times a year and is on the pills 2 or 3 times. So much better.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia H

customer_reviews.title: I think it’s working?
customer_reviews.text: No real obvious changes with my two dogs after a month of use. One of our dogs usually starts to develop a rash or perhaps yeast infections this time of year and so far he seems to be avoiding the problem. If this continues through the summer I’ll be singing the praises of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: I would absolutely recommend this to anyone with a dog who has a ...
customer_reviews.text: My Pomeranian/ Chihuahua mix has always had digestion problems, even before I rescued her. I can't believe the change I have seen, since she started taking this. It's been a couple of months, and she hasn't had any diarrhea or vomiting, AND she eats her food regularly now. I would absolutely recommend this to anyone with a dog who has a very sensitive stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Best out there
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried dozens of probiotic brands and this one is by far the best. My dog has digestive and yeast problems so this is a good addition to her rotation of supplements. I’ve seen some mention this did not work for their dogs allergies. My dog has bad allergies and this isn’t something that helps her so IMHO I wouldn’t suggest this as an option for allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Undecided....
customer_reviews.text: Purchased be cause my dog was going to be on antibiotics for 30 days due to Lyme disease. It did seem to help her tummy. No digestive issues whatsoever. I'm continuing to give it to her in hope that it will help with her horrible allergies. So far, I haven't seen much of a difference, but I will keep giving her the probiotics until I'm finished with the product and then will re-evaluate.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product!! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd develops diarrhea from time to time. We changed his food a few times and even tried special diets but his stomach would always get upset again. We started adding Probiotic Miracle to his meals the past two weeks and absolutely no diarrhea!!! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Most economical and helpful option!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for an economical probiotic for my two standard poodles (50 and 60lbs). While they love probiotic chews, the cost was a little prohibitive for the long run. One of my poodles love this stuff on her food every morning. The other is less than thrilled, sniffs it, and then waits 4-5 minutes before she'll eat her food. However, she does still eat! And this has regulated their bowl movements and helped add solidity to their stool. Overall, its been a great product for us.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley N

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't say he is 100% better, but it's significant enough where he couldn't live ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has done wonders for my bulldog, he's had yeasty skin/mild chronic dermatitis/chronic otitis externa and this probiotic has helped tremendously. I wouldn't say he is 100% better, but it's significant enough where he couldn't live without this product. I ran out of this stuff for almost a week and my dog was miserable. Will never go without it again.
customer_reviews.author: maddox

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I got this on a tip from my raw feeding group. I think Gabby is getting the benefit from this daily. Just remember, once you open it , put it in the fridge. You will only use a tiny scoop , 2-3 times a day.. THE SCOOP IS TINY !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn S.

customer_reviews.title: Thank God for this
customer_reviews.text: It was heartbreaking to see my dog suffering silently, constantly spending money on vets for my pitbull hives and ear infection medicine, money on medicated shampoos and no help. Thank God for this product. I no longer see my dog losing hair due to hives, scratching his ears because of infection. this has worked to get rid of the yeast bacteria that these Vets couldnt do.
customer_reviews.author: Ismael Colon

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: My aussie was having the runs a couple of times a week for the last 9 months. I thought I was going to have to take him off the raw food diet that benefitted him so much. A friend told me to try probiotics and I just picked the highest rated on Amazon. Lucky us!! This product is amazing. He has not had the runs at all since we started this. I'm back to feeding him raw tripe and everything else that was wrecking havoc with him before. All good . I could not be more satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: No thanks
customer_reviews.text: This did more than nothing for my two year old pups. I fed it to both dogs, because I figured probiotics should be great for both, but the itchy pup is still itchy as can be and after giving it two weeks both of their digestive systems are a mess. They didn't go back to pooping regularly until I stopped giving it to them.
customer_reviews.author: CLC

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My dog was suffering from stress colitis. We moved and she is blind so all of it was very upsetting to her. The vet was going to start her on probiotics so I just put her on some myself. She responded very well and her system has settled down. I still give it to her as she has a touchy stomach anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Cherall H.

customer_reviews.title: This product is great!
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed a huge improvement in our oldest dog. She had a bad yeast infection and we had tried all sorts of shampoos, etc., but nothing worked. The shampoos would very briefly, but this was something that needed correcting from the inside. I will continue to buy this product for our dogs. Thank you all so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua C. Lovell

product_meta.title: NUSENTIA Probiotic Miracle Dog Probiotics for Dogs (Up to 360 Servings)
feature_bullets: The Original probiotics for dogs and cats. 360 scoops per jar. (that's 360 Billion CFU per jar). Great value for large dogs, individuals with multiple pets, or for providing multiple servings per day. Best when used within 8 months Also available in a smaller, 120 serving size jar)

The #1 TRUSTED PROBIOTICS FOR PETS: 12 years of consistent, Natural results combatting dog diarrhea, loose stool, yeast overgrowth, bad breath, constipation, itching & scratching, allergies, digestive issues, and gut related problems in pets. Wholistic choice to bring your pet relief.*
VET Recommended - No rice. No Maltodextrin. Gluten-Free, Non-GMO, Non Dairy, No Soy, No Fillers, No Flavorings, Odorless, NO BYPRODUCTS.
Feel Confident: Made in USA at GMP certified facility. Quality tested.

Backed by Science: Formulated specifically for the dietary and health needs of your dog or cat. Scientifically researched for pets and recommended by Top Breeders and Veterinarians as a #1 trusted brand in America for over 11 years.
